dbdiffchecker.sql

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbdiffchecker.sql.Schema
      • dbdiffchecker.sql.Table
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MySQLTable, SQLiteTable

    public abstract class Table
extends Schema
    Resembles a table in an SQL database and contains info about the table's columns and indices.
    Since:
    9-10-17
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        name - The name of the table.
        create - he create statement of the table which will be used to create its columns and indices.

      • equals

        public abstract java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> equals(Table t1)
        Takes in a Table and compares it to the current one, the result is SQL statements to make them the same.
        Parameters:
        t1 - A Table object which is being compared to this Table object.
        Returns:
        The SQL needed to make the tables the same.

      • parseCreateStatement

        protected abstract void parseCreateStatement()
        Parses the create statment of the table picking up columns and indices that need to be added.

      • dropCols

        protected abstract java.lang.String dropCols(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Column> cols1,
                                             java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Column> cols2)
        Takes column lists and returns part of an SQL statement that drops a column or several columns.
        Parameters:
        cols1 - The column names and column data of the current table.
        cols2 - The column names and column data of a different table of the same name.
        Returns:
        Part of an SQL statement that drops a column or several columns.

      • otherCols

        protected abstract java.lang.String otherCols(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Column> cols1,
                                              java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Column> cols2)
        Takes two column lists and returns part of an SQL statement that modifies and/or adds columns.
        Parameters:
        cols1 - The column names and column data of the current table.
        cols2 - The column names and column data of a different table of the same name.
        Returns:
        Part of an SQL statement that modifies and,or adds columns.

      • dropIndices

        protected abstract java.lang.String dropIndices(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Index> dev,
                                                java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Index> live)
        Takes two index lists and returns part of an SQL statement that drop indexes.
        Parameters:
        dev - The index names and index data of the current table.
        live - The index names and index data of a different table of the same name.
        Returns:
        Part of an SQL statement that drops indexes.

      • otherIndices

                                                 java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Index> live)
        Takes two lists of indices and returns part of an SQL statement that either adds or drops and adds indices.
        Parameters:
        dev - The index names and index data of the current table.
        live - The index names and index data of a different table of the same name.
        Returns:
        Part of an SQL statement that either adds or drops and adds indexes.
